      • getSingleSNPGenotype

        public smartSequence getSingleSNPGenotype(java.lang.String SNP,
                                 java.lang.String token,
                                 java.lang.String id,
                                 smartSequence sequence)
        Parameters:
        SNP - a single SNP coordinate, such as chr1:1223-1224
        token - access token
        id - patient id
        sequence - an instance of smartSequence
        Returns:
        smartSequence with updated SNP genotypes, sample source, etc. Coordinate-genotype pairs can be obtained by calling smartSequence.getSequences()
